doc:
Simon Oakland https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simon_Oakland 0 Simon Oakland (August 28, 1915 – August 29, 1983) was an American actor of stage, screen, and television. During his career, Oakland performed primarily on television, appearing in over 130 series and made-for-television movies between 1951 and 1983. Simon_Oakland ( August_28_,_1915 – August_29_,_1983 ) was an_American_actor of stage , screen , and television . During his_career , Oakland performed primarily on television , appearing in over_130_series_and_made-for-television_movies between 1951_and_1983 .
